txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken great swords from the Orcs and Angmarim in the lands surrounding Aughaire. Deliver the items to Raith at Aughaire in the south-western reaches of Angmar.
'We will melt these weapons down and reforge them anew. Thank you.'
'The stronger members of the Orcs and Angmarim carry large, heavy blades. If we can get these blades, we can make weapons for ourselves from the remains.'
Council of the North Task: Broken Great Swords
The Hillmen at Aughaire have requested a collection of broken great swords to be delivered to Raith.
Deliver the broken great swords to Raith at Aughaire in Angmar
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver broken great swords from the Orcs and Angmarim surrounding Aughaire to Raith, a Hillman within the settlement.
Wanted: Broken great swords from the Orcs and Angmarim in the lands surrounding Aughaire.
